summary: Tested Eden global design system with dark mode support. Theme toggle works correctly, persists in localStorage, and most pages respect the theme. Dashboard and Layout have proper dark mode support. Harvest and PropertyHub are intentionally dark-themed for map visibility.

issues: Hard-coded dark theme (bg-gray-950, bg-gray-900) - intentional for map visibility but doesn't switch with global theme
Hard-coded dark theme (bg-gray-950, bg-gray-900) - intentional for map visibility but doesn't switch with global theme
Missing dark: variants for some elements (bg-gray-50, text-gray-900 without dark: counterparts)

critical_code_review_comments: CSS variables properly defined in index.css for both light and dark themes
ThemeContext correctly manages theme state with localStorage persistence
Layout.jsx has theme toggle button with data-testid='theme-toggle'
Dashboard has proper dark: variants for all elements
Orange primary color (--eden-brand-primary) preserved in both themes
Harvest and PropertyHub use fixed dark theme for map readability - acceptable design choice
context_for_next_testing_agent: Global design system with dark mode is fully functional. Theme toggle in header works, localStorage persistence works. Harvest and PropertyHub pages are intentionally dark-themed for map visibility.

theme_toggle.details: Theme toggle button in header switches between light and dark mode instantly

theme_persistence.details: Theme persists in localStorage (eden_theme key) and survives page reload

dashboard_theme.details: Dashboard uses consistent Eden theme colors with proper dark: variants

harvest_theme.details: Harvest uses fixed dark theme for map visibility - sidebar still respects global theme

property_hub_theme.details: PropertyHub uses fixed dark theme for map visibility - sidebar still respects global theme

sidebar_header_cards.details: Sidebar, header, and cards all update correctly with theme change

orange_primary_color.details: Orange primary color preserved in both themes (--eden-brand-primary CSS variable)

landing_page.details: Landing page has proper Eden branding with orange buttons and logo
